Uses of Class
SimulationController

    • Uses of SimulationController in <Unnamed>

      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type SimulationController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Commando.aimingSoldierStep(SimulationController controller)
      Empty overwritten method Commando does not aim!
      void Soldier.aimingSoldierStep(SimulationController controller)
      Step calculation for aiming soldier Since both regular soldier and sniper do the same thing, This function is moved to the abstract soldier class.
      Soldier Zombie.distanceToClosestSoldier(SimulationController controller)
      Finds the closest soldier.
      Zombie Soldier.distanceToClosestZombie(SimulationController controller)
      Measures distance to the closest zombie Returns the zombie if the distance is less than soldier's shooting range
      abstract void Zombie.followingZombieStep(SimulationController controller)
      Abstract following zombie step Called in step method of the zombie
      void RegularZombie.followingZombieStep(SimulationController controller)
      Overrides following zombie step in the abstract zombie class Move to the next position and if the step count of this zombie is 4, change state to wandering
      void FastZombie.followingZombieStep(SimulationController controller)
      Overrides following zombie step in the abstract zombie class Move to the next position and change state to wandering
      void SlowZombie.followingZombieStep(SimulationController controller)
      Overrides following zombie step in the abstract zombie class Try to find closest soldier and change direction to the soldier Go to the next position Again, try to measure the distance to the same soldier, if it is less than detection range, change state to wandering
      void SimulationObject.nextPosition(SimulationController controller)
      Calculates the next position of the simulation object(Soldier or zombie) If the next position is out of bounds, changes direction and the simulation object does not move.
      void Commando.searchingSoldierStep(SimulationController controller)
      Step calculation for searching commando Find closest zombie and tries to shoot it If no closest zombie is present, moves to next position and again tries to find a closest zombie and shoot it
      void RegularSoldier.searchingSoldierStep(SimulationController controller)
      Step calculation for searching soldier.
      void Sniper.searchingSoldierStep(SimulationController controller)
      Step calculation for searching sniper Go to the next position Change state to aiming
      abstract void Soldier.searchingSoldierStep(SimulationController controller)
      Abstract searching soldier step Called in step method of the soldier
      void Commando.shootingSoldierStep(SimulationController controller)
      Step calculation for shooting commando Creates bullet, Try to find another zombie while in the shooting state If no closest zombie is present, change random direction and search for another zombie
      void RegularSoldier.shootingSoldierStep(SimulationController controller)
      Step calculation for shooting soldier Creates bullet, If closest zombie, change state to aiming, If not, pick random direction and change state to searching
      void Sniper.shootingSoldierStep(SimulationController controller)
      Step calculation for shooting soldier Creates bullet, Try to find another zombie while in the shooting state.
      abstract void Soldier.shootingSoldierStep(SimulationController controller)
      Abstract shooting soldier step Called in step method of the soldier
      void Commando.step(SimulationController controller)
      Overrides step method in the simulation object class
      void Zombie.step(SimulationController controller)
      Zombie step This method will be called every time a zombie calls step method Later, the specialized wandering or following zombie step methods will be called inside this method.
      void Bullet.step(SimulationController controller)
      Overridden step function of simulation object class Divide the path into N number of steps.
      void RegularSoldier.step(SimulationController controller)
      Overrides step method in the simulation object class
      void Sniper.step(SimulationController controller)
      Overrides step method in the simulation object class
      abstract void SimulationObject.step(SimulationController controller)
      abstract step function
      abstract void Zombie.wanderingZombieStep(SimulationController controller)
      Abstract wandering zombie step Called in step method of the zombie
      void RegularZombie.wanderingZombieStep(SimulationController controller)
      Overrides wandering zombie step in the abstract zombie class Go to the next position, Try to find closest soldier and change state to following, If no closest soldier, do nothing
      void FastZombie.wanderingZombieStep(SimulationController controller)
      Overrides wandering zombie step in the abstract zombie class Try to find closest soldier and change direction to the soldier and change state to following If no closest soldier is present, move to the next position
      void SlowZombie.wanderingZombieStep(SimulationController controller)
      Overrides wandering zombie step in the abstract zombie class Try to find closest soldier and change state to following If no closest soldier is present, move to the next position
